name: ag-grid-community
description: Advanced Data Grid / Data Table supporting Javascript / React / AngularJS / Web Components

scripts.initMarketing: git checkout marketing && npm run updateCoreDependencies && npm run buildCore
scripts.cleanCoreDependencies: npx lerna clean --scope ag-grid-community --scope ag-grid-enterprise --scope ag-grid-angular --scope ag-grid-react --scope ag-grid-vue --scope ag-grid-docs
scripts.updateCoreDependencies: npx lerna bootstrap --scope ag-grid-community --scope ag-grid-enterprise --scope ag-grid-angular --scope ag-grid-react --scope ag-grid-vue --scope ag-grid-docs
scripts.cleanBuildCoreDependencies: npm run cleanCoreDependencies && npm run updateCoreDependencies && npm run buildCore
scripts.resetNonDocs: git checkout packages/ag-grid-community && git checkout packages/ag-grid-community && git checkout packages/ag-grid-angular && git checkout packages/ag-grid-react && git checkout packages/ag-grid-vue
scripts.build: npm run build-modules && npx lerna run build --ignore ag-grid-polymer-example --ignore ag-grid-charts-example
scripts.buildAndTest: npx lerna run build --ignore ag-grid-polymer-example --ignore ag-grid-charts-example && npx lerna run test
scripts.buildCore: npx lerna run build --scope ag-grid-community --scope ag-grid-enterprise --scope ag-grid-angular --scope ag-grid-react --scope ag-grid-vue
scripts.buildVanilla: npx lerna run build --scope ag-grid-community --scope ag-grid-enterprise
scripts.buildAngular: npx lerna run build --scope ag-grid-community --scope ag-grid-angular
scripts.buildVue: npx lerna run build --scope ag-grid-community --scope ag-grid-vue
scripts.buildReact: npx lerna run build --scope ag-grid-community --scope ag-grid-react
scripts.updateAndRebuild: npm run updateDependencies && npm run build
scripts.updateAndRebuildFull: npm run updateDependencies && npm run buildCI
scripts.init: npm run initLatest && npm run updateAndRebuild
scripts.initFullBuild: npm run initLatest && npm run updateAndRebuildFull
